short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds an button to GHL opportunities to open script sidekick scripts for a given contact.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HighLevel dialling assist tool for Script Sidekick users.

Note that you must have HighLevel and Script Sidekick accounts to use this extension.
